author: Jason E. Clapham
description: As Jason, the reader who created this sent us this recipe says, "A champagne charged riff on the classic Ostend Fizz this is a good alternative to a Kir Royale."
name: Ostend Fizz Royale
recipeIngredient: 90 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir
